question.prompt: What is the principal (chief) question or concern you have regarding your current condition?
In your own words, please provide a brief narrative of the details of the problem for which you are requesting a second opinion:
If there was only one symptom we could help the patient with, which would you have us relieve?
If other, please specify in detail below:
For how long has patient had this one above symptom?

selection.text: more than 3 months but less than 1 year

question.prompt: If other, please specify in detail below:
Besides the one symptom above chosen as one to be relieved, please choose all other symptoms below which patient is experiencing. (choose all that apply)
If other, please specify in detail below:
Does patient have a family history of any of the following conditions? (choose all that apply)
If other, please list below:
Does patient have a family history of cancer?
If yes, please provide additional information below:
Is patient currently employed?
If yes, what is patient's current occupation?
Has patient undergone a recent change in work environment?
Has patient undergone a recent change in home environment?
If yes, please explain in detail below:
Has patient ever used tobacco (cigarettes, cigars, pipe, chewing)?
If yes, is patient still using tobacco?
If no, when did patient quit?
If yes, when did he/she start?
Please complete additional information below:

column_definition.label: # of times smoking pipe per day
Amount of chewing tobacco per day

question.prompt: Has patient consumed alcohol in the past?
If yes, is patient still consuming alcohol?
If no, when did patient quit?
If yes, when did he/she start?
How much alcohol does patient consume on average on a daily or weekly basis?
Has patient ever participated in illicit drug use?
If yes, when did this start?
Please describe in detail, the drug usage (include dates, what drugs used, ongoing or quit, etc.) below:
Does patient experience frequent sinus infections?
If yes, how frequent do sinus infections occur?
If other, please specify in detail below:
Does patient experience baseline continuous nasal and sinus symptoms?
If yes, how often do patient's baseline symptoms get worse?
If other, please specify in detail below:
If symptoms are not continuous, does patient experience intermittent nasal and sinus symptoms?
If yes, how often do patient experience intermittent symptoms?
If other, please specify in detail below:
Do patient's symptoms improve between episodes?
Does patient experience nasal congestion and / or blockage (stuffiness)?
If yes, please describe this symptom in depth below (describe the symptom, when it developed, etc.):
Which side of patient's nose is most often affected?
Is this symptom (nasal congestion and / or blockage/stuffiness) present continuously?
Please rate the symptom severity

selection.text: Does not limit patient's physical, social and / or work activity
Mildly limits patient's physical, social and / or work activity
Moderately limits patient's physical, social and / or work activity
Severely limits patient's physical, social and / or work activity

question.prompt: For how long has this symptom been present?

selection.text: more than 3 months but less than 1 year

If other, please specify in detail below:
When did patient first develop this symptom?
Is the congestion / blockage worsened by lying down?
Is the congestion / blockage worsened by pollution?
Is the congestion / blockage worsened by alcohol consumption?
Is the congestion / blockage worsened by tobacco smoke?
Is the congestion / blockage worsened by fragrances such as perfumes?
Is the congestion / blockage worsened by environmental irritants?

If yes, is this symptom (headache and/ or facial pain) present continuously?
If patient is a woman, do headaches vary with menstrual cycle?(choose one)
On which side of patient's head/face is the pain/discomfort most prominent?
Please describe this symptom in detail (describe the intensity of the symptom, location, duration, frequency, when it first developed, etc.) below:

selection.text: No, patient never received allergy shots
Yes, patient received allergy shots for more than one year

Patient received my last shot less than 1 year ago
Patient received last shot more than a year ago but less than 2 years ago
Patient received last shot more than 2 years ago but less than 5 years ago
Patient received last shot more than 5 years ago but less than 10 years ago
The allergy shots helped patient's condition a great deal
The allergy shots helped patient's condition very little
The allergy shots did not help patient's condition
